document_data.name: Dreamwhisper
document_data.mainbody: '''''Dreamwhisper''''' was a [[spell]] granted to wielders of [[Mystra]]'s magics.
document_data.Effects: When ''dreamwhisper'' was cast, it flashed blue fire in the caster's mind for a mere moment as a sign of Mystra's attention.
document_data.History: In the {{YearlinkName|1357}}, [[Aumlar Chaunthoun]], a companion of [[Shandril Shessair]], unwillingly cast ''dreamwhisper'' on himself. He later believed the spell to be sent by Mystra as a test.
